thread.title: Lewis Hamilton conquers conditions to remain man to beat in Austin - Richmond and Twickenham Times
thread.title_full: Lewis Hamilton conquers conditions to remain man to beat in Austin - Richmond and Twickenham Times - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Richmond and Twickenham Times
title: Lewis Hamilton conquers conditions to remain man to beat in Austin - Richmond and Twickenham Times
text:
Championship leader Lewis Hamilton set the pace at a rain-lashed Austin after final practice for the United States Grand Prix went ahead as scheduled. Bizarrely the session was played out in front of empty grandstands after fans were urged to stay away from the circuit on safety grounds with heavy rain continuing to batter the area.
 Richmond and Twickenham Times.
